Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist."},"recordLicenseUsage(uint256)":{"details":"Callable por contratos autorizados para trackear actividad","params":{"tokenId":"ID de la licencia"}},"remainingSupply()":{"returns":{"_0":"Supply restante"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"royaltyInfo(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Returns how much royalty is owed and to whom, based on a sale price that may be denominated in any unit of exchange. The royalty amount is denominated and should be paid in that same unit of exchange."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Equivalent to `safeTransferFrom(from, to, tokenId, '')`."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Safely transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must exist and be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"Approve or remove `operator` as an operator for the caller. Operators can call {transferFrom} or {safeTransferFrom} for any token owned by the caller. Requirements: - The `operator` cannot be the caller. Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event."},"setLicensePrice(uint256)":{"params":{"newPrice":"Nuevo precio en wei"}},"setPandoraOracle(address)":{"params":{"newOracle":"Nueva direcci\u00f3n del or\u00e1culo"}},"setRoyaltyInfo(address,uint96)":{"params":{"feeNumerator":"Porcentaje en basis points (ej: 500 = 5%)","receiver":"Direcci\u00f3n que recibe los royalties"}},"setTreasuryAddress(address)":{"params":{"newTreasury":"Nueva direcci\u00f3n de la tesorer\u00eda"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"Override supportsInterface para resolver conflictos de herencia"},"symbol()":{"details":"Returns the token collection symbol."},"tokenURI(uint256)":{"details":"Sobrescribe tokenURI para incluir metadata personalizada"},"totalMinted()":{"returns":{"_0":"Total minteado"}},"totalSupply()":{"details":"Returns the total number of tokens in existence. Burned tokens will reduce the count. Emits a {Transfer} event."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). advanceToPhase(uint256,uint256).details: Solo callable por el owner para avanzar fases

params.newPhaseMaxSupply: Supply mximo para la nueva fase

approve(address,uint256).details: Gives permission to `to` to transfer `tokenId` token to another account. See {ERC721A-_approve}. Requirements: - The caller must own the token or be an approved operator.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the number of tokens in `owner`'s account.

params._licensePrice: Precio base de la licencia en wei
params.name: Nombre del token ERC-721 (ej: "Licencia Vista Horizonte")

getApproved(uint256).details: Returns the account approved for `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist.

getLicensePhase(uint256).details: Basado en el contador de uso y reglas del protocolo

returns.currentPhase: Fase actual, totalPhases Total de fases configuradas

returns._0: Nmero de votos (igual al balance de licencias)
True si tiene al menos una licencia

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Returns if the `operator` is allowed to manage all of the assets of `owner`. See {setApprovalForAll}.

mintLicense(address,uint256).details: Solo callable por el backend verificado despus de KYC/TOS off-chain

mintWithPayment(uint256).details: Permite a usuarios mintear pagando el precio establecido

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

ownerOf(uint256).details: Returns the owner of the `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist.

recordLicenseUsage(uint256).details: Callable por contratos autorizados para trackear actividad

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

royaltyInfo(uint256,uint256).details: Returns how much royalty is owed and to whom, based on a sale price that may be denominated in any unit of exchange. The royalty amount is denominated and should be paid in that same unit of exchange.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Safely transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must exist and be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event.

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Approve or remove `operator` as an operator for the caller. Operators can call {transferFrom} or {safeTransferFrom} for any token owned by the caller. Requirements: - The `operator` cannot be the caller. Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Override supportsInterface para resolver conflictos de herencia

tokenURI(uint256).details: Sobrescribe tokenURI para incluir metadata personalizada

totalSupply().details: Returns the total number of tokens in existence. Burned tokens will reduce the count. To get the total number of tokens minted, please see {_totalMinted}.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers `tokenId` from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. Emits a {Transfer} event.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeLicense(uint256,uint256).details: Solo callable por el orculo despus de verificar requisitos off-chain

params.tokenId: ID de la licencia a upgradear

advanceToPhase(uint256,uint256).notice: Actualiza a una nueva fase del protocolo

getLicensePhase(uint256).notice: Obtiene la fase actual de una licencia

getVotes(address).notice: Obtiene el poder de voto de una direccin (1 licencia = 1 voto)

hasActiveLicense(address).notice: Verifica si una direccin tiene una licencia activa

licensePrice().notice: Precio base de la licencia (en wei)

pandoraOracle().notice: Direccin autorizada para mintear licencias (backend de Pandora)

recordLicenseUsage(uint256).notice: Registra el uso de una licencia

remainingSupply().notice: Obtiene el total de licencias disponibles para mintear

setLicensePrice(uint256).notice: Actualiza el precio de la licencia

setTreasuryAddress(address).notice: Actualiza la direccin de la tesorera

totalMinted().notice: Obtiene el total de licencias minteadas

treasuryAddress().notice: Direccin de la tesorera para recaudar fondos

upgradeLicense(uint256,uint256).notice: Upgrade una licencia a una fase superior
